core.unit.fs

Class FileUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.unit.AUnit
      • core.unit.ComplexUnit
        • core.unit.SimpleUnit
          • core.unit.fs.FileUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUnit

    public class FileUnit
extends SimpleUnit
    This Unit is designed for whole files. It will perform tests on any property which is set.
